content.en: 3D Point Cloud Compression: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address the challenge of compressing 3D point cloud data while minimizing distortion and preserving important information. These algorithms utilize techniques such as mean-shift clustering, RANSAC algorithm, 2D DCT transform, region growing segmentation, polynomial equations, sampling-based compression, CNN-based up-sampling, motion estimation and compensation, quadric surface representation, occupancy images, fast coding unit algorithms, and more. By employing these algorithms, researchers aim to achieve efficient compression of point cloud data for storage and transmission, improve compression performances, reduce complexity, and optimize block size selection, among other objectives.
content.da: 3D punkt-sky kompression: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle udfordringen med at komprimere 3D punkt-sky data, mens de minimerer forvrængning og bevarer vigtig information. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som mean-shift clustering, RANSAC algoritme, 2D DCT transform, region voksende segmentering, polynomier, sampling-baseret kompression, CNN-baseret op-sampling, bevægelsesestimering og kompensation, kvadrisk overfladerepræsentation, besættelsesbilleder, hurtige kodningsenhedsalgoritmer og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer stræber forskerne efter at opnå effektiv kompression af punkt-sky data til lagring og overførsel, forbedre kompressionspræstationer, reducere kompleksitet og optimere blokstørrelsesvalg, blandt andre mål.
